items.sentence: I have an appointment in less than half an hour.
Put another plate on the table. We have a guest.
I had to sell my guitar in order to pay my rent.
Tom poured a bucket of cold water over his head.
It doesn't matter to me if you open the windows.
Tom said he hoped that Mary would be here today.
It was always easy for us to get along with Tom.
When are you going to get rid of all this stuff?
The phone's ringing, but no one's picking it up.
Tom drummed on the table with his pencil, bored.
